title: 2021 World AeroPress Champion - Tuomas Merikanto (Finland) - Inverted
preparation_steps: Weigh 18.0 g of coffee and grind on Macap Labo 70D at setting 7.0.
Assemble the AeroPress in inverted position and place on the scale.
Prepare Third Wave Water Formula 2 and heat to 80 °C.
Have pitcher and target server ready for the 'pour from altitude' stage.

brewing_steps.instruction: Add 18.0 g of grounds to the inverted AeroPress. Start timer and add 50 g of 80 °C water between 0:00–0:10 (gentle pour).
brewing_steps.audio_script: You have 10 seconds to add 18 grams of grounds and gently pour 50 grams of 80-degree water.

brewing_steps.instruction: From 0:10–0:15, stir very gently 3 times back and forth.
brewing_steps.audio_script: Now, stir very gently three times back and forth.

brewing_steps.instruction: From 0:15–0:30 continue pouring water gradually until total poured reaches 200 g (slow, controlled pour).
brewing_steps.audio_script: Continue pouring slowly until you reach 200 grams total weight.

brewing_steps.instruction: At 0:50, stir very gently 3 more times to re-homogenize the bed.
brewing_steps.audio_script: Stir gently three more times to mix everything evenly.

brewing_steps.instruction: Push out any excess air from the chamber and attach the filter cap.
brewing_steps.short_instruction: Press out air • Attach filter cap
brewing_steps.audio_script: Push out excess air and attach the cap. You have 10 seconds.

brewing_steps.instruction: Allow to steep. At ~1:35 place pitcher on top. At 1:40 (≈100 s) flip the brewer carefully.
brewing_steps.audio_script: Let the coffee steep. You have 40 seconds. At 1 minute 35, place the pitcher on top and flip.

brewing_steps.instruction: Immediately begin pressing from 1:40–2:00 (≈20 s press).
brewing_steps.audio_script: Start pressing immediately. You have 20 seconds to finish the press.

brewing_steps.instruction: From 2:00–2:30 (≈120–150 s) swirl the brewed coffee and perform a 'pour from altitude' into another pitcher to aerate and cool.
brewing_steps.audio_script: Swirl the coffee and pour from altitude. You have 30 seconds to aerate and cool.

what_to_expect.description: The 2021 World AeroPress Champion recipe by Tuomas Merikanto showcases advanced brewing techniques focused on water chemistry and precise temperature control. This method uses Third Wave Water Formula 2 for optimal mineral balance, a low extraction temperature of 80Â°C to highlight delicate flavors, and innovative manipulation techniques including very gentle stirring and the signature 'pour from altitude' method. Expect a cup with exceptional clarity, bright acidity, and complex flavor layers that highlight the coffee's origin characteristics. The inverted method with precise timing and gentle agitation creates a clean, structured profile perfect for showcasing high-quality single-origin coffees. The final aeration step adds a unique texture and cooling effect that enhances the overall drinking experience.

Expect a cup with exceptional clarity, bright acidity, and complex flavor layers that highlight the coffee's origin characteristics. The inverted method with precise timing creates a clean, structured profile perfect for showcasing high-quality single-origin coffees.

equipment: Third Wave Water Formula 2 (or prepared mineral profile)
notes: Recipe by Tuomas Merikanto (World Champ 2021). Focus on water chemistry (TWW Formula 2), two pouring stages with a low extraction point (80°C) and manipulation techniques (very gentle stirs, quick flip and press) followed by 'pour from altitude' for aeration and cooling.
